reviewText: I loved this documentary and put a video review on YouTube, "Goshen. Thumbs up, Beautiful Film. Tarahumara Minimalist Runners." From my relatively comfortable suburban life in Beavercreek, Ohio, I've tried to adopt the best habits of the Raramuri and the result ... at 55, I'm nearly 7 years into an all plant fueled diet and feeling 30 years younger. I run ultra marathons in huaraches and have seven 100 mile foot races completed so far. Great film. People need this wisdom.
disappointed, kind of a letdown after back to eden.
